Title: Very Erectus
Writer: Douglas Adams (based upon the novels by), Max Landis (created by), Robert C. Cooper
Actors: Samuel Barnett, Elijah Wood, Hannah Marks, Fiona Dourif
Plot: As Dirk and Todd embark on a hunt for Patrick Spring's dark enigmas, Todd reveals a secret of his own. Detectives Estevez and Zimmerfield take big risks as they inch closer to the truth of their missing person's investigation.
